%text If $f(x)$ and $g(x)$ be two functions such that \underline\text{both} $\lim_{x\to a}f(x)$ \underline\text{and} $\lim_{x\to a}g(x)$ exist, then the following results hold
% \begin{align} \lim_{x\to a}\left[ f(x)\cdot g(x)\right] &= \lim_{x\to a}f(x)\cdot\lim_{x\to a}g(x) \\ \text{Moreover, if } g(x) &= \alpha \text{ (a constant), then }\\ \lim_{x\to a}\left[ f(x)\cdot g(x)\right] &= \lim_{x\to a}\left[ \alpha\cdot f(x)\right] \\ &= \lim_{x\to a}f(x)\cdot\lim_{x\to a}\alpha \\ &= \alpha\cdot\lim_{x\to a}f(x) \end{align}
